name: 7 of Clubs
description:
Card game that is easy to learn and rather fun.

Quite similar to games like Sevens, Fan Tan, Parliament, Sjuan, Domino and Cinquillo.

Be the first one to play all your cards and you win (detailed rules in game)!

Now in the iPhone/iPad version:
- Realistic cards graphics
- Four different AI-opponents from Fool to Grandmaster
- Single-player games against multiple AI opponents are fast and fun
- Up to 4 player multiplayer on single device

NOTE: Does not display properly on iPhone 4S and older.
